metadata.Title: CVE-2008-5144 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: nvidia-cg-toolkit-installer in nvidia-cg-toolkit 2.0.0015 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the /tmp/nvidia-cg-toolkit-manifest temporary file.

notes.Note: jdstrand> per Debian, code can be run via postinst, but requires special circumstances

criterions.comment: nvidia-cg-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
